unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Academy of Photography Blizzard of 1888 photograph album
abstract_ssm: The album documents the effects of the blizzard in Brooklyn and Manhattan, showing street scenes, snow removal efforts, and different modes of transit hampered by the snowfall.
